attributes.action: Stop Wigan Council from removing the road barrier on Walthew House Lane.
attributes.background: Wigan Council are planning on removing the barrier on Walthew House Lane to allow traffic to travel down to the industrial estate to reach Scot Lane. This will cause adverse affects to residents of the area with an increase in large vehicular traffic, decrease in house value and family safety.

rejection.details:
This is about a matter which is the responsibility of Wigan Council.

The Council has its own e-petitioning system which can be accessed at the following site:
http://democracy.wigan.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
